channel.title: Demise PK'ing Source - 2 Questions - Delta
channel.description:
First Question: i have working pk points in my server (demise pking, delta) and i believe its set up in the way that a certain shop is given the "system" and then the items are given values for kills, like 2, 5, etc. i took my donar shop and switched it (non donars can go in and donars cant lol) and it has a pvp values like the pk shop. it says kills too, like "this item cost #$%#@!#$ kills." instead of coins, so thats step one. i put the pvp value "item #### == 2" (<-- example) but when you click the item to see the value, it just takes the value of a working one that you clicked before. how could i make it stable? if you need any more info feel free to tell me, i tried my best atm explaining this :p
second question: when is started using the source, if you tele'd to a certain area (ex Cammy bank using ::tele #### #### not a magic button) a lumbridge guide would spam ur text box and make u walk back "inbounds" it makes it so you cant move to certain places, which is quite upsetting. if anybody knows the demise pking source and client, then this should be something you might know ;p
sorry it's long..i tried to go into as much detail as i could lol

item.title: Demise PK'ing Source - 2 Questions - Delta
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

First Question:
i have working pk points in my server (demise pking, delta) and i believe its set up in the way that a certain shop is given the “system” and then the items are given values for kills, like 2, 5, etc. i took my donar shop and switched it (non donars can go in and donars cant lol) and it has a pvp values like the pk shop. it says kills too, like “this item cost #$%#@!#$ kills.” instead of coins, so thats step one. i put the pvp value “item #### == 2” (<-- example) but when you click the item to see the value, it just takes the value of a working one that you clicked before. how could i make it stable? if you need any more info feel free to tell me, i tried my best atm explaining this

second question:
when is started using the source, if you tele’d to a certain area (ex Cammy bank using ::tele #### #### not a magic button) a lumbridge guide would spam ur text box and make u walk back “inbounds” it makes it so you cant move to certain places, which is quite upsetting. if anybody knows the demise pking source and client, then this should be something you might know ;p

sorry it’s long…i tried to go into as much detail as i could lol
